data.title: CropData Technology
data.description:
Largest Blockchain AgEcosystem 
Empowering Millions of Farmers

platforms.name: Dr. Krishi
platforms.description: Dr. Krishi Platform is the bottom-most layer (last-mile infrastructure) with a multi-tier network of laboratories designed on the telemedicine philosophy. It is a workflow-based platform that uses integrated technologies to collect, monitor and analyze information, upwards from the farm level.

platforms.name: AgData
platforms.description: CropData Gateway or AgData platform is an ecosystem for data aggregation, management and visualization, providing a seamless interface for third-parties to access and correspond with CropData's customers.

platforms.name: Agriota
platforms.description: Agriota E-Marketplace is an advanced agricultural commodities marketplace platform with a range of services for contract, bid and money management, entity management, accounting, billing, reconciliation, analytics, fraud, risk and regulatory compliance management etc.

platforms.name: KrishiCo
platforms.description: KrishiCo platform manages third-party modules for banking, rating, credit, trade finance, insurance, packaging, logistics, warehousing, government relief etc.

message: All The Best For Your Machine Test
